about.title: PK4U: Parking for You
about.heroSubtitle: Open and free platform for smart urban parking management in Smart Cities
about.challengeP1: In modern cities, finding parking has become a daily challenge that causes stress, wasted time, and unnecessary increases in traffic and pollution.
about.challengeP2b: , negatively affects quality of life and urban sustainability.
about.challengeP3: Commercial solutions are often proprietary and expensive, limiting adoption and interoperability among Smart City services.
about.solutionP1: is an open source and free web platform that centralizes real-time parking availability information.
about.solutionP2: We unify data from different parking providers into a single interface with interactive maps, empowering drivers to make better decisions and reduce traffic and pollution.
about.solutionP3: Our goal is to democratize access to information and promote sustainable mobility in smart cities.

feature1.title: Map Visualization
feature1.description: Interactive map with OpenStreetMap showing the location of all parkings and their overall status.

feature2.title: Real-Time Information
feature2.description: Occupancy data updated periodically to reflect parking spot availability as accurately as possible.

feature3.title: Open Source
feature3.description: Project distributed under an Open Source license to promote collaboration, transparency, and adaptation to the needs of any city.

cta.title: Ready to transform urban mobility?
cta.description: Join the PK4U community, explore the code, contribute, or simply use the platform to improve your daily life in the city.

projectInfo.title: PK4U: Parking for You
projectInfo.description: Real-time intelligent parking management for Smart Cities. This project is part of the UNIR Master's Thesis.

error.tooLong: Alias must be 20 characters or fewer.
error.invalidChars: Alias may only contain letters, numbers, and spaces.
